title: HR Management Practical Competency Strengthening: Reinforcement Learning-Based Renewable Energy Building Control System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Explain the offline operational requirements of renewable energy building systems and power supply constraints.
Apply a design approach that simultaneously considers battery lifespan extension and energy efficiency optimization when designing reinforcement learning reward functions.
Simulate operational scenarios of solar power generation, generator, and battery systems using a Gaussian distribution-based DRL algorithm.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
